description:
A React project with an experinced WEB developer. This program is fast pased and requires fast learning. We decided to use and learn about the most relevent compnemorary technologies for this project such as:
  • React
  • Next.js
  • Redux
  • MongoDB Atlas
  • Apolo JS
  • GraphQL
I can not give details about this project but I will be sure to upload it once it is in the air.
